•    Typically without budget or hire/fire authority.
•    Focuses on mentoring, coaching, and coordination.Achieve sales targets assigned to the area ,territory wise , Brand wise every month - Ensure implementation of company strategies in the market place - Launch and nurture international brands - Train and develop knowledge and skills of Territory executives to build competencies - Profile towns and customers to improve the productivity of territories - Maintain customer contact of the team to enhance prescription share - Organise outreach activities to capture patient population - Channelise distribution to ensure availability of products - Provide feedback to Marketing team in relation to brand promotion and competitors activity - Ensure timely submission of reports - Maintain high ethical values in the market place.The base pay for this position isIn specific locations, the pay range may vary from the range posted.JOB FAMILY:DIVISION:LOCATION:ADDITIONAL LOCATIONS:WORK SHIFT:TRAVEL:MEDICAL SURVEILLANCE:SIGNIFICANT WORK ACTIVITIES:Job Details
